Class RoomControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • RoomControl

  • public class RoomControl
extends java.lang.Object
    RoomControl acts as the middle-man between a Room booking system and the class that carries out the operations on each individual room. This class finds the appropriate rooms to make the add/change actions on. Conditional upon the success of methods called, this class is also responsible for returning relevant messages for the primary class to print out.
    Author:
    Hayden Charles Smith, z3418003 Last modified: 20th April 2013
